-----------------------------------------------------------------

RiffTrax are comedy audio commentaries of Hollywood movies, television programs and films featuring Mystery Science 

Theater 3000 comedians Michael J. Nelson, Kevin Murphy and Bill Corbett heckling (or riffing) films in the style of 

MST3K, a TV show in which Nelson was the head writer, and later the host. The RiffTrax are sold online and 

delivered by streaming video and download. The site was launched by Nelson and Legend Films, now renamed Legend3D, 

in 2006 and is based in San Diego. In 2012, Rifftrax was purchased from Legend3D by Mike, Kevin and Bill and the 

RiffTrax CEO David G. Martin.
